title: Account transfer
body: So i came into noticing that account transfer is gone or i am blind and do not see the transfer buying options can someone help and explain?

replies.body: You can't transfer accounts during pre-season.
Ty for saying im so stupid xd
Nah no worries fam. Just so you know, they *should* be back up around Nov 20!
ay i still cant the transfer buying option now
